title: A Bill and answer, betwixt Jack Catch plaintiff, and Slingsby Bethel, & al. defendants, of the year, 1681 published for the satisfaction of all true lovers of conscience and equity.
author: Bethel, Slingsby, 1617-1697.
publisher: Printed by J.B. for Joseph Hindmarsh ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
